mapper.insert: insert into hms_member(name, tel, email, id, photo, password, nickname, post_no, basic_address, detail_address, status_message, authority, birth) values(#{name}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{id}, #{photo}, sha2(#{password},256), #{nickname}, #{postNo}, #{basicAddress}, #{detailAddress}, #{statusMessage}, #{authority}, #{birth})
mapper.select: select member_id, name, tel, email, id, photo, nickname, post_no, basic_address, detail_address, birth, status_message, created_date, authority from hms_member order by member_id desc
select member_id, name, tel, email, id, photo, nickname, post_no, basic_address, detail_address, status_message, authority, birth, created_date from hms_member where member_id=#{no}
